extendedInfo.description: CARTUS â Relocation Mobile AppThe Cartus Mobile App gives Cartus clients and their transferring employees quick access to relocation information. Check move status, view key events through the News Feed, add relocation contacts directly from our app to your phone, file expense reports and more. Itâs fast, free and secure. Use your current CartusOnline login information to start using the app today.FOR RELOCATING EMPLOYEES:â¢	View a News Feed for info on key move-related eventsâ¢	Create personal categories to tag and group news feed itemsâ¢	Check the status of your moveâ¢	In preparation for filing an Expense Report, categorize and organize expense items, including receipt images, as you go alongâ¢	File your expense report from your deviceâ¢	Exchange notes with your Cartus consultantFOR CARTUS CLIENT CONTACTS:â¢	View a News Feed for info on exceptions, industry trends, service evaluations, and moreâ¢	Create personal categories to tag and group news feed itemsâ¢	Action policy revision and exception requestsâ¢	Check the status of employeesâ moves and add them to your âfavoritesâ for easy trackingâ¢	Review key program statistics on your dashboardâ¢	Exchanges notes with your account team*Only available to Cartus clients  and their relocating employees with a current CartusOnline user ID and password. If you do not have a log in ID, please contact your Cartus representative for help.

reviews.title: Useless and the design sucks
reviews.comment: I couldn\'t actually do anything useful through the app. I had to go to the website to do everything. Another big downside is that this looks like an app on an iPhone. Not a good design. Please, update the design and navigation using Android\'s Holo design guidelines so it matches with the rest of Jelly Bean.
reviews.author: Smitesh Kharat

reviews.title: Font too small - useless
reviews.comment: Had high hopes for this app, font is way too small, and app won\'t allow me to zoom. So unfortunately this app is useless to me
reviews.author: Sarah Blakeley

reviews.title: Worthless Website
reviews.comment: No way to register from the log in page. no menus no options, a waste of time.
reviews.author: Brian Shaw
